name: pri-son
description:
Pri-son is  a game about children that arrested and they try to escape from the cops

Current version of game is done for  a jam due that its not completed

This game mainly for learning unity and for jam

Development was painful; due issues i had mainly a broken keyboard and due jam needs very short time

! TahaBG#5271

This game is unfinished in this version you cannot die but you can kill "Cobs" (intentional misspelling)

FEATURES(includes things not added but planned for release)

Lots Of Easter Eggs

Crazy Endings

Making your own guns

permadeath

Cop Mode

Multiplayer

Horror Mode
